herb.plantMessage: I started a new herb timer, ill message you when theyre ready. (approx 1h20m)
herb.growingMessage: The herbs you planted earlier arent ready yet.
herb.harvestMessage: Your herbs should be ready for harvest now!

morchella.plantMessage: I started a new mushroom timer, ill message you when theyre ready. (approx 4h)
morchella.growingMessage: The mushrooms you planted earlier arent ready yet.
morchella.harvestMessage: Your mushrooms should be ready for harvest now!

grapevine.plantMessage: I started a new grapevine timer, ill message you when theyre ready. (approx 1h20m)
grapevine.growingMessage: The grapes you planted earlier are still growing, be patient.
grapevine.harvestMessage: Your grapevines have matured! Time to start picking :)

barberry.plantMessage: I started a new barberry bush timer, ill message you when theyre ready. (approx 3h20m)
barberry.growingMessage: The barberry bushes you planted earlier arent ready yet.
barberry.harvestMessage: Your barberry bushes are ready to be picked!

bloodwood.plantMessage: I started a new bloodwood tree regrowth timer, ill message you when theyre ready. (approx 6h)
bloodwood.growingMessage: The Bloodwood trees you cut down earlier havnt grown back yet.
bloodwood.harvestMessage: The Bloodwood Trees you cut down earlier have grown back!

coconut.plantMessage: I started a new coconut regrowth timer, ill message you when theyre ready. (approx 4h30m)
coconut.growingMessage: The coconuts you picked earlier havnt finished growing back yet.
coconut.harvestMessage: A new batch of coconuts are ready to be picked!

sweetcorn.plantMessage: I started a new sweetcorn timer, ill message you when theyre ready. (approx 50m)
sweetcorn.growingMessage: The sweetcorn you planted earlier arent ready for harvest yet.
sweetcorn.harvestMessage: Your sweetcorn are ready to be harvested now!

tester.plantMessage: fast grow debug crop timer started

cactus.plantMessage: I started a new cactus spine regrowth timer, ill message you when theyre ready to be picked again. (approx 1h15m)
cactus.growingMessage: The cactus spines you picked earlier havnt had enough time to regrow yet.
cactus.harvestMessage: The cactus spines are ready to be harvested again!
